about_the_game:
Doupleri: Unleash Your Reflexes and Conquer Speed!
Embark on a thrilling journey of precision and lightning-fast reflexes in Doupleri, an adrenaline-pumping game that will push your limits to the max! This fast-paced challenge is all about quick thinking and flawless execution. Can you keep up as the game throws increasingly difficult patterns your way?

Key Features:
Speed Frenzy: Doupleri throws you into a whirlwind of ever-accelerating action. The faster you go, the more intense it gets – are you quick enough to handle the heat?

Global Glory Awaits: Compete with players worldwide and see if you can dominate the leaderboards. Prove your skills and become a Doupleri legend!

Play Your Way: Customize the difficulty, button layout, and visuals to create the perfect Doupleri experience for you. It's all about comfort and peak performance!

Unleash the Excitement:
Adrenaline Rush: Immerse yourself in the electrifying world of Doupleri, where every second counts and every move matters. Can you handle the pressure and emerge victorious?

Thrilling Challenge: Brace yourself for an ever-increasing test of your reflexes and precision as Doupleri relentlessly raises the bar. Are you up for the ultimate challenge?

Customized Experience: Tailor the game to your liking and create the perfect environment for you to shine. Whether you're a seasoned gamer or a newbie, Doupleri has something for everyone!

Doupleri: It's a race against the clock, a battle for bragging rights, and an exhilarating adventure that will leave you breathless. Are you ready to take the challenge? Hit play and feel the rush!

name: Doupleri

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: I3 2100
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 210
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10+
  • Processor: i5 3570
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RX540
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 500 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any
  • VR Support: No

short_description: A chill game about destroying blocks with symbols.
supported_languages: English, Portuguese - Brazil, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Korean, Spanish - Latin America, Japanese, Russian, Hindi
